about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside Steam.

Blaze through the skies of World of Warplanes in the Grumman XF4F-3, an American Tier IV experimental fighter! This small and nimble aircraft sports two pairs of machine guns, one of them high caliber, to make short work of any enemy that comes close! Good airspeed and powerful boost allow for quick traversal of the battlefield so that you can stay in action constantly!

DLC Content:

  • Grumman XF4F-3, a Tier IV American fighter

  • Hangar slot

  • 100% crew for the Grumman XF4F-3

  • Paint scheme for the Grumman XF4F-3 with an additional bonus in battle: +3% airspeed

  • Incendiary ammunition (Period I) x10

  • Emergency Medical Kit (Period I) x5

  • Fire Extinguishing System (Period I) x5

Note: This DLC is released as part of Publishing Weekend 2025 and will be available until February 27, 2025.

name: World of Warplanes - Grumman XF4F-3 Pack
short_description: Blaze through the skies of World of Warplanes in Grumman XF4F-3, the Tier IV American experimental fighter! This small, fast, and nimble aircraft sports two pairs of machine guns, one of them high caliber, to make short work of any enemy that comes close!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, German*, Polish*, Czech*, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Croatian
*languages with full audio support
